code: export const validateCommentForm=values=>{const errors={};const digitReg=/^\d+$/;if(!values.rating||!digitReg.test(values.rating)){errors.rating='Required';}if(values.author.length<2){errors.author='Must be at least 2 characters.';}else if(values.author.length>15){errors.author='Must be 15 characters or less.';}return errors;};
